attributes.additional_details: I cannot stress enough how important it is for these to be implemented as there have been complaints and judgements to transgender people going in toilets. I think that instead of womens and mens rooms, have separate cubicles that do not have a sign for a certain gender to enter them. By this I mean one individual cubicle that everyone can feel happy and safe in without judgement to how they identify.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to install cubicle toilets that are rooms itself with the toilet, sink and a hand dryer or paper towels that are gender neutral so anyone can go in them, no matter their sexual orientation.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly which toilets you mean.

You could start a petition for the Government to make all public toilets gender neutral, if that's what you want to happen.
